div.div: all types of qi [disease]; all qi; all types of qi [quality]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all types of qi [disease]; all qi; all types of qi [quality]

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of qi bing 氣病 , qi disease. Su wen 素問 74: 諸氣膹鬱，皆屬 於肺 , “ All [ diseases with] pent-up qi [resulting in heart-]pressure, are without exception associated with the lung”. In the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 the vast majority of 諸氣 is with this meaning.

② Combined Designation of all types of physiological qi. Su wen 素問 10: 諸血者皆屬於心，諸氣者皆屬 於肺，此四肢八溪之朝夕也 , “All blood is tied to the heart. All qi is tied to the lung. This is the morning and the evening of the four limbs and the eight ravines”. ③ Combined Designation of all types of qualities of pharmaceutical substances. Yi xue qi yuan 醫學啟源 Lj: 凡同氣 之物必有諸味，同味之物必有諸氣 , “Among all items with identical qi [quality] one will find all types of flavors. [Among all] items with identical flavors one will find all types of qi [quality] ”.
